item.title: First Post - Schedule, content and introduction
Introduction: Content and Schedule
item.description: This Blog is for me to help myself and whats infinitely more important others, to understand concepts in the fields of Mathematics & Computer Science. Every now and then, I will diverge into other topics that will still be connected to M & CS, but nonetheless interesting to myself. I will consistently try to create a post a day on simple topics initially and slowly build up into more complicated ones.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
